generated_body: The article titled "Trump's Deal Allowing 3D-Printed Guns Online Deemed Illegal" is likely to explore the legal implications surrounding a recent court ruling that found Donald Trump's actions regarding the distribution of 3D-printed gun designs online to be unlawful. Readers may expect an analysis of the legal framework governing firearm regulations and digital distribution, as well as insights into the reactions from various stakeholders, including gun rights advocates and legal experts. It could also delve into the potential impact of this ruling on future policies regarding 3D-printed firearms, although the specifics of those consequences may vary.
